entity1.name: Fairytales

entity55.name: fairytales
entity55.description: Stories, often featuring magical or mythical creatures and events, that are passed down through generations as part of a culture's oral tradition.

entity56.name: oral traditions
entity56.description: The process by which information is transmitted verbally from one generation to another within a community or culture.

entity57.name: folklore
entity57.description: A body of traditional beliefs, customs, and stories that are preserved and passed down through generations within a particular cultural group.

entity58.name: cultural myths
entity58.description: Narratives or stories that hold significant symbolic meaning and are deeply embedded in the collective consciousness of a culture, often explaining natural phenomena or societal norms.

entity59.name: Brothers Grimm
entity59.description: A pair of German brothers known for their collection of fairy tales.
